page.description: Generate a SQL Drop Database statement for the table passed in. Note: Not all database vendors support dropping a database through SQL.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::GenerateDropDatabaseStatement() Syntax SQL_Statement as C = SQL::Connection::GenerateDropDatabaseStatement( Name as C ) ArgumentDescription SQL_StatementAn add user group statement appropriate for the database. NameThe name of the database to drop.
Description The .GenerateDropDatabaseStatement() method generates the SQL statement that will remove a database. Limitations Example Note, Microsoft Access does not support dropping a database. dim conn as SQL::Connection conn.open("{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}") ? conn.GenerateDropDatabaseStatement("buffalo") = ""
See Also SQL::Connection Object
